dct_title_s: A plan of Pondicherry and its environs taken from a French manuscript.
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:7,200. Relief around fort shown pictorially; relief of Red Hill shown with hachures. Indexed. North oriented to right. Map removed from unknown larger volume. Dimensions: 44 x 58 centimeters
